mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_IMAGES(IMAGE_ORIGINAL_NAME, IMAGE_PATH, IMAGE_TYPE, REFERENCE_ID,MAIN_IMAGE) VALUES ( #{imageOriginalName},#{imagePath},#{imageType},#{referenceId},#{mainImage} )
